package.description: This is a driver package for the Barrett Technologies Whole Arm Manipulator (WAM) Robot. It is a 4- or 7-DOF robotic arm for use in manipulation research. This driver, in particular, enables direct control of a WAM robot from a PC with a CANBus interface. This bypasses the PC104 stacks used in the normal WAM driver.
package.author: Simon Leonard/sleonard@jhu.edu, Jonathan Bohren/jbo@jhu.edu
